lib package¶

Submodules¶

lib.text_analysis module¶

lib.text_analysis.analyze_text(source_text)¶

Returns the words of a text with their frequency.

Uses NLTK RegexpTokenizer in order to tokenize lowered words not with only blank space but also with all the punctuation.

Parameters

source_text (String) – Text to analyze

Raises

TypeError

Returns

Counter object (sub-class of dict) with all the words and their frequency

lib.text_analysis.ari_complexity_text(source_text)¶

Calculate the complexity of a text.

Uses RegexpTokenizer in order to tokenize words not with only blank space but also with all the punctuation. Complexity calculated with the ARI algorithm.

Parameters

source_text (String) – Texto to calculate the complexity of.

:raises TypeError :returns: Float with two digit after decimal, representing the complexity.

lib.text_translation module¶

lib.text_translation.detect_language(word)¶

Identifies the source language of a word

Uses Google Translate API to detect the language of the word.

Parameters

word (String) – Word to detect the language of

Raises

TypeError

Returns

Language prefix

lib.text_translation.get_languages()¶

Gets the dictionary of languages of Google Translate.

{‘prefix’:’language’} es: ‘it’:’italiano’

Returns

The dictionary of languages

lib.text_translation.translate(word, src, dest)¶

Function that translates a word into a chosen language

Uses Google Translate API.

Parameters

  • word (String) – word to translate

  • src (String) – source language prefix

  • dest (String) – target language prefix

Raises

TypeError

Returns

Translated word
